contentencoded:
Apple will unveil new hardware and software at its live product announcement event on Tuesday. Eric Limer, staff writer at Gizmodo, joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to give a preview of what to expect. 

Click the audio player above to hear more.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, September 10, 2013

teaser: Reports say the company could unveil fingerprint technology.
title: Apple announces new hardware at Tuesday's live event
description: Reports say the company could unveil fingerprint technology.
